item.title: Adventure in Vancouver
item.description: If you just want to see the pictures, you can check them out in my gallery here Day 1 - The Start The trip started on a good note before I landed in the city. I had a lovely conversation on the flight with a social worker who was on their way to a conference. After we landed, I made my way to the Sky Train and bought a Compass Card.
